doc.field: This collection was created and collected by members of the McGivern and Burke families, who were active in the Belfast United Club in the Bronx during the 1950s. This collection consists of materials documenting the activities of the Belfast United Club in the Bronx, including photographs and brochures from the organization's functions and sporting events.

This collection was created and collected by members of the McGivern and Burke families, who were active in the Belfast United Club in the Bronx during the 1950s. This collection consists of materials documenting the activities of the Belfast United Club in the Bronx, including photographs and brochures from the organization's functions and sporting events.

This collection consists of materials collected by members of the McGivern Family documenting the activities of the Belfast United Club in the Bronx, including photographs and brochures from the organization's functions and sporting events.
This collection was created and collected by members of the McGivern and Burke families, who were active in the Belfast United Club in the Bronx during the 1950s.
This collected was donated to the Archives of Irish America in January of 2015 by Dana Kelly, Lisa Fullard, and Nancy Mercurio. The accession number associated with this gift is 2015.008.
